DOC.brief_summary: Emergency call center across country prepare Next Generation 911 ( NG911 ) initiative , allow citizen place 9-1-1 `` call '' use digital technology text messaging , email , Skype instant messaging , expand emergency information source also include stream video , photo uploads , automatic crash notification . The impact new information communication technology task use time-sensitive emergency situation unknown . Our study design address follow hypothesis : 1 ) We hypothesize NG911 implementation significant effect telecommunicator stress level 2 ) A resiliency training tailor need telecommunicators mitigate impact NG911 implementation stress level . We test hypothesis follow specific aim : Aim 1 : Measure level stress , job satisfaction job performance among 9-1-1 telecommunicators NG911 implementation . Aim 2 : Develop test efficacy evidence-based resiliency training worker support intervention improve psychological well-being job performance 9-1-1 telecommunicators . Aim 3 : Build ABM tool 9-1-1 call center improve 9-1-1 telecommunicator workforce train smooth transition future call center innovation .
DOC.brief_title: Multi-tasking Hyper-tasking : Investigating Impact Next Generation 911
